Bases: shiva.envs.Environment.Environment

Unique Agent Behaviours

reset(force=False, *args, **kwargs)¶

To be called by Shiva Learner It’s just to reinitialize our metrics. Unity resets the environment on its own.

get_role_metrics(role=None, episodic=True)¶
is_done(n_episodes=None)¶

One Shiva episode is when all instances in the Environment terminate at least once On MultiAgent env, all agents will have the same number of dones, so we can check only one of them
